snippet: Christian Ginesi, 25, was on the 24th floor of a hotel being built on West 46th Street when the accident happened, the police said.
abstract: Construction worker Christian Gisci dies after falling down elevator shaft at Riu Plaza Times Square construction site in midtown Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: Christian Ginesi, 25, was on the 24th floor of a hotel being built on West 46th Street when the accident happened, the police said.

headline.main: Worker at Manhattan Construction Site Falls Down Elevator Shaft and Dies
headline.print_headline: Fatal Fall at Midtown Construction Site
